Desc.entry: Gymnastics club for children and young people aged 4-16 years and pre school children aged 18 months-4 years.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon & Tues 5-6.30pm, 5-8pm (advanced), Mon 10.30-11.15am, Wed 1.30-2.15pm (children aged 18 months-4 years), Thurs 5-6.30pm, 5-8pm, 6.30-8pm (advanced), Fri 4.30-6pm, 6-7.30pm, Sat 9.30-11am, 11am-12.30pm (children aged 4-16 years)
